required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Study to Evaluate the Mass Babance and Biotransformation of [14C]SHR6390 in Healthy Adult Male Volunteers
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase I Mass Balance and Biotransformation Study of [14C]SHR6390 in Chinese Healthy Adult Male Volunteers.

brief_summary.textblock: Study to Evaluate the mass balance and biotransformation of single dose [14C]SHR6390 in Chinese healthy adult male volunteers.

primary_outcome.measure: Quantitive analysis of whole radioactivity of excrement of orally administered [14C]SHR6390 in chinese healthy adult male volunteers to obtain the mass balance data and the main excretion pathway in human body by liquid scintillation counter.
primary_outcome.time_frame: up to Day 21 (approx) from the start of administration.
primary_outcome.description: The percentage of radioactive dose of [14C] radiolabelled SHR6390 recovered in urine,faces and in total,up to Day 21(approx)

primary_outcome.measure: Quantitive analysisi of the concentrations of SHR6390 in plasma using the validated LC-MS to obtain pharmacokinetic data.
primary_outcome.time_frame: up to 7 days (approx) form the start of administration
primary_outcome.description: The concentration of SHR6390 in plasma up to D7

primary_outcome.measure: Identification of the main metabolite and biotransformation pathway of SHR6390 and investigation of metabolite in plasma by LC-HR MS
primary_outcome.time_frame: up to 7 days (approx) form the start of administration
primary_outcome.description: Proportion of different metabolites of SHR6390 up to D7

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of Participants with Adverse Evevts(AEs) and Serious Adverse Evevts
secondary_outcome.time_frame: up to Day 21 (approx) from the start of administration.

intervention.description: Patients will receive single dose of orally [14C]SHR6390 on Day 1.
